meanings.definition: Stylish or fashionable in a showy or extravagant way.
meanings.sent1: The new dress she bought was much swankier than her old one.
meanings.sent2: The celebrity arrived at the event in a swankier car than anyone else.
meanings.sent3: She felt a bit silly wearing such a swankier outfit to a casual picnic.
meanings.sent4: His swankier lifestyle made his friends envious.
meanings.sent5: The swankier decorations at the party made it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: To boast or brag in a showy manner.
meanings.sent1: He always swankier about his accomplishments to impress others.
meanings.sent2: She tends to swankier about her expensive jewelry collection.
meanings.sent3: The parrot seemed to swankier about how many words it could say.
meanings.sent4: The politician continued to swankier about his achievements during the speech.
meanings.sent5: The child would swankier about his toy collection to anyone who would listen.
